ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This study was supported by the Institut Pasteur, the French Government’s Investissement d’Avenir program, Laboratoire d’Excellence “Integrative Biology of Emerging Infectious Diseases” (grant n°ANR-10-LABX-62-IBEID to A-BF), the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation program under ZIKAlliance grant agreement no. 734548 and the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation program under grant agreement No 731060 (Infravec2, Research Infrastructures for the control of vector-borne diseases; http://infravec2.eu/). We are grateful to Francesca Scolari, Antonios Michaelakis, Igor Pajovic, Mario Bjelis, Eleonora Faccio, Claudio Venturelli, Xiaoguang Chen and Ludvik M. Gomulski for providing mosquito samples.
